code:
export const isString = str => new RegExp("[a-zA-Z]").test(str) || '' === str;
export const isNumber = str => new RegExp("[1-9]").test(str) || '' === str;

sourcesContent:
export const isString = (str) => new RegExp("[a-zA-Z]").test(str) || '' === str;

export const isNumber = (str) => new RegExp("[1-9]").test(str) || '' === str;
